texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Enabling submission port support for Postfix is really easy. To have postfix listen on both 25 and 587, be sure that the line starting with  submission  is uncommented in /etc/postfix/master.cf:
texts.text: Enabling submission port support for Postfix is really easy. To have postfix listen on both 25 and 587, be sure that the line starting with  submission  is uncommented in /etc/postfix/master.cf:

texts.label: code
texts.orig:
smtp      inet  n       -       n       -       -       smtpd
submission inet n      -       n       -       -       smtpd
texts.text:
smtp      inet  n       -       n       -       -       smtpd
submission inet n      -       n       -       -       smtpd
